{{Location Intro|The '''Akademiya'''|description=<p>{{If Self|The Akademiya|It|The Akademiya}} is [[Sumeru Akademiya]]'s main building, built upon the [[Divine Tree]]. The [[House of Daena]], the Akademiya's library, is located at the heart of the building.</p>}}

The doors to the Akademiya will automatically open upon approaching the building.

==Trivia==
* A [[Luxurious Chest]] can be found in The Akademiya that awards {{Item List|Mora*185,000|mode=sent}}.
** Opening the chest initiates the following dialogue:
**:{{Dialogue Start|left-line=1|'''Paimon:''' Whoa! Here's another treasure chest! Let's open it! There's a note in it, too...<br>'''Paimon:''' "...I should stop procrastinating. I will finish the thesis proposal tomorrow!"<br>'''Paimon:''' "I'll just put 5,000 Mora in this chest every time I waste another day. I won't retrieve the Mora until my thesis proposal is approved!"<br>'''Paimon:''' Haha, let's see how much Mora this chest contains, shall we?}}
